related_post.text: why i cant type [ in pycharm?

so_post.text: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33188104/pycharmerrorcannotperformrefactoringusingselectedelements according to this the user has the same problem.The answer is; > If you are using [Right Alt] + F to insert square bracket (for example with Czech keyboard layout) pycharm interprets it as [Ctrl] + [Alt] + F which is a shortcut to some sort of refactoring.> > You can change the shortcut to something else in File  Settings  Keymap  Main menu  Refactor  Extract  Field..

comments: cant type character and getrs appropriate SO response
